name: refeed
description: Refeed is a self-hosted RSS reader with filtering, grouping, and categorization. It provides a responsive UI and is ideal for managing large numbers of RSS feeds.
features: RSS aggregation: Subscribe to unlimited RSS and Atom feeds from blogs, news sites, and podcasts.
Feed organization: Group feeds into folders and categories for easier navigation and management.
Article filtering: Create rules to automatically tag, mark as read, or hide articles based on keywords.
Full-text search: Find articles across all subscribed feeds using content and title search.
Read/unread tracking: Mark articles as read automatically or manually to keep track of what you've seen.
Starred articles: Save important articles for later reference with a favorites system.
Mobile responsive: Read feeds comfortably on any device with an adaptive, touch-friendly interface.
Keyboard shortcuts: Navigate feeds and articles quickly using customizable keyboard commands.
OPML import/export: Migrate feed subscriptions from other RSS readers or back up your collection.
Article preview: Read full article content within the app without visiting external websites.
Refresh scheduling: Configure automatic feed updates at custom intervals to stay current.
Dark mode: Switch to a dark theme for comfortable reading in low-light environments.
